house_listing.house_description: Jacksonvilles best kept secret neighborhood is Clifton Bluff. Across river from Alltel Stadium. 2600 Sq ft, all Brick, include HUGE kitchen,huge pool w/ diving board, all brick office in back yard, AC controlled Florida room. For more info on this house or others like it, go to www.Ken-Harris.com

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Bay Window, Ceiling Fan(s), Double-Door Entry, Drapes/Curtains, FrenchDoors, Library, Recreation Room
